verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:1
verses.text: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:2
verses.text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:3
verses.text: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:4
verses.text: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:5
verses.text: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 3:6
verses.text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
